Went yesterday 2-4-2017, we were greeted immediately by friendly staff in both Japanese and vietnamese which was nice. The staff are friendly and explained everything in detail and as it was a monday they had a pay for 3 people deal if you have 4 in your group. The food was fresh and they also have an ice cream bar and salad bar which is also included.
Overall nice and quick service and the staff very attentive.
